Managed KVM VPS
Experience superior performance and privacy with our fully managed and self managed KVM virtual servers. MilesWeb's KVM VPS hosting allows you to run variety of operating system on a virtual machine for significantly less than the cost of a full dedicated server. The main feature of KVM hardware virtualization is that it allocates dedicated and secure isolated resources for every virtual machine i.e. all resources are guaranteed!

Best VPS Hosting Features

  • Hardware Virtualization
  • Customizable VPS Environment
  • Flexibility & Scalability
  • Unmatched Server Performance
  • Total Control (SolusVM Control Panel)
  • Instant Setup


Save 20% on Managed KVM VPS plans by using the coupon code KVM20NOV16
